body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Gerald Morris and I'm with Premium Motors. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Sara Mitchell.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Sara. Can you please provide me with your phone number so we can reach out to you?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five - eight seven one - two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara. And may I also have your email address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my email address is sara.mitchell@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information. We will look into the quality issue you're experiencing with the product. Is there anything else you'd like to add before we proceed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Sara. Thank you for reaching out to us. We will investigate this matter further and get back to you soon. Have a great day!
